welcome_message_body: Welcome to Medan, Indonesia! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's vibrant culture, rich culinary scene, and the warm hospitality of its people. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything that Medan has to offer.

restaurants.name: Klub Palladium
restaurants.description: Klub Palladium is a fast food restaurant located in Medan.
restaurants.address: Palladium Mall Lt. GS 26 No. 3 (Jl. Kapten Maulana Lubis No. 8), Medan, Sumut 20112
